title: Blissful Grand Cayman Beachfront Island Escape with Five Restaurants, Rooftop Bar & Infinity Pool
description:
Bask in the sun-drenched Caribbean charms of this oceanfront Grand Cayman retreat perfectly perched mere steps from the golden sands and crystal-clear waters of the famous Seven Mile Beach. Serenaded by gorgeous sunrises and sunsets, immerse yourself in true-blue island fun as you spend your time lounging on the expansive pool deck and taking refreshing dips.

If you're feeling a little peckish, embark on a gastronomic journey across the hotel's five restaurants, sampling California coastal classics, seasonally-inspired Japanese sushis and Mediterranean delicacies. Head to Pom Pom, the island's highest rooftop bar and sip on exotic Latin-inspired cocktails while soaking up panoramic ocean views and enjoying live DJ music by night.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Grand Cayman, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 32 Seafire Way, Seven Mile Beach, Grand Cayman, KY1-1301, Cayman Islands
